br.com.neppo.cache.interceptor

Annotation Type Cacheable


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
@Documented
public @interface Cacheable
    Indicates a cached method
    Author:
    bhlangonijr

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean enabled
      Enable/disable the cache
      boolean enableMinCacheHitVerification
      Enable the mechanism that disable the access to the caching mechanism, if the cache hits is too low given what was configured for that specific object
      HashKeyGeneratorStrategy hashKeyGeneratorStrategy
      Hashkey generation strategy
      int minCacheHitRatioCounting
      Minimal number of cache requests to trigger minCacheHitRatioRequired verification on the type of object being cached
      double minCacheHitRatioRequired
      Required ratio of cache hits on a given object to keep caching it.
      boolean negativeCache
      Enable/disable negative caching
      int ttl
      Define the time-to-live of the given entry in the cache

    • Element Detail

      • enabled

        public abstract boolean enabled
        Enable/disable the cache
        Returns:
        if the cache is enabled
        Default:
        true

      • ttl

        public abstract int ttl
        Define the time-to-live of the given entry in the cache
        Returns:
        time to live in milliseconds
        Default:
        600

      • hashKeyGeneratorStrategy

        public abstract HashKeyGeneratorStrategy hashKeyGeneratorStrategy
        Hashkey generation strategy
        Returns:
        list of parameters and fields
        Default:
        br.com.neppo.cache.hashkey.HashKeyGeneratorStrategy.REFLECTION

      • enableMinCacheHitVerification

        public abstract boolean enableMinCacheHitVerification
        Enable the mechanism that disable the access to the caching mechanism, if the cache hits is too low given what was configured for that specific object
        Returns:
        true if min cache hit verification is enabled
        Default:
        false

      • minCacheHitRatioRequired

        public abstract double minCacheHitRatioRequired
        Required ratio of cache hits on a given object to keep caching it. If the minimal number is not reached the caching mechanism is automaticaly disabled
        Returns:
        percentage of cache hits required
        Default:
        0.2

      • minCacheHitRatioCounting

        public abstract int minCacheHitRatioCounting
        Minimal number of cache requests to trigger minCacheHitRatioRequired verification on the type of object being cached
        Returns:
        min number of requests to cache
        Default:
        50

      • negativeCache

        public abstract boolean negativeCache
        Enable/disable negative caching
        Returns:
        Default:
        false
